snippet: Mitt Romney will make his first appearance on the iconic talk show “Meet the Press’' on Sunday, a move clearly intended to inject himself instantly back onto the main stage of the presidential campaign stage.
abstract: Mitt Romney will make his first appearance on the iconic talk show “Meet the Press’' on Sunday, a move clearly intended to inject himself instantly back onto the main stage of the presidential campaign stage.

headline.main: Romney to Appear on 'Meet the Press'
